title: Inner Worlds
content:
Inner Worlds is a platform game similar to [url=http://www.dosgamesarchive.com/download/game/157]Xargon[/url], Gods and Metroid, but with rpg elements.

Does anyone played this game? It was released as freeware, but I can't find it over the internet. If someone know or finds a link of this game it will be great!

[url=http://www.sleepless.com/iw/]www.sleepless.com/iw/[/url] - this is the official site, but the game isn't there for download.

[img]http://www.sleepless.com/iw/images/iwshots/dmp06.gif[/img]

[img]http://www.sleepless.com/iw/images/jaw.gif[/img]
Hey btw this green guy looks like some kind of a Yorp cousin [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] .----

title: Re: found something
content: Thanx. Although I have dosbox and vdmsound, the game runs fine only in DOS where my soundcard doesn't work. So you found version 1.2. There must be version 1.3 (iw13-reg.exe). Dunno if version 1.3 fixes these glitches.----

title: Re: found something
content: Hehe, that'd make a cool garg if it had eyes! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] [url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url] :: [url=http://www.keengrid.net/ckfiles/levels/xky1tuned.zip]xky1tuned.zip[/url]

title: Re: found something
content:
Very nice. I've not played the game yet, but I will make a point of doing so (points which usually forget about... but not this time...)

In the screenshot posted, I can see two objects (which appear to be pretty much un-altered) that were in Xargon.--------------
[url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: Xargon
content: That's probably because [url=http://www.mobygames.com/developer/sheet/view/developerId,932/]Joe Hitchens[/url] worked on both games.
